activities: TechSmith Corporation uses personal information received from the EU primarily to fulfill product and services orders, provide technical support and in improving product and service offerings.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TechSmith Corporation will cooperate with the appropriate regulatory authorities, including local data protection authorities (i.e., European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)), to resolve any complaints regarding the transfer of personal data that cannot be resolved between TechSmith Corporation and an individual.
